thread.title: Gibson, Hunter lead surging Twins to 7-1 win over Indians
thread.title_full: Gibson, Hunter lead surging Twins to 7-1 win over Indians

title: Gibson, Hunter lead surging Twins to 7-1 win over Indians
text:
> Top News Gibson, Hunter lead surging Twins to 7-1 win over Indians Minnesota Twins' Joe Mauer hits a double off Cleveland Indians starting pitcher Carlos Carrasco in the fourth inning of the first baseball game of a doubleheader, Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015, in Cleveland. (AP Photo/Tony Dejak) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
